gen:link.msg:message: `OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesOtherCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
